lists.xml:
function element(name, row){if (!isNaN(parseInt(name[0], 10))) {name='_'+name} send('<' + name + '>
');   for(field in row) { if (typeof(row[field])=='object') {element(field, row[field])} else {send('<field name="' + field + '">');  send((''+row[field]).replace(/&/g,'&').replace(/</g,'<'));  send('</field>
');}  }   send('</' + name + '>
');};        function(head, req) {    provides('xml', function() {    send('<xml>
');    while (row=getRow()) {   element('row', row)   }    send('</xml>');   });    }
